channel.title: Praise-Reborn [Allstar]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape. I am here to show you all the server I am currently working on. Yes, it's an allstar. I understand that most of you hate allstar based servers, so I know that there will be some flame, I am okay with that. Anyways, lets get to the development.
The base I am working with is Futurescape v1 by: I c Ex I have always liked that source, so I thought I would use it as a base and change everything.
[b]So far I have added:[/b] Dicing minigame [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/os9y7p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2qmn7r7.jpg[/img]
[b]Improved Skills[/b] Crafting: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zoc8ch.jpg[/img]
That's all i have to show as of right now, tell me what you all think!

item.title: Praise-Reborn [Allstar]
item.dc:creator: @Praise Praise
item.description:
@Praise wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:4, topic:423650”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=526274.msg3833234#msg3833234 date=1322710126]
allstar base… youre only setting yourself back a good 4 years…
[/quote]He’s right, but at least it’s not another leeched PI…[/quote]I can’t get away from Allstar, it just can’t be done. However, I am trying to add more “unique” features for the players enjoyment.

Read full topic

@Praise wrote:

Hello Moparscape. I am here to show you all the server I am currently working on. Yes, it’s an allstar. I understand that most of you hate allstar based servers, so I know that there will be some flame, I am okay with that. Anyways, lets get to the development.

The base I am working with is Futurescape v1 by: I c Ex
I have always liked that source, so I thought I would use it as a base and change everything.

So far I have added:
Dicing minigame

Improved Skills
Crafting:

That’s all i have to show as of right now, tell me what you all think!
